Name: Kabitis 2: Fire Sword
About the game: Top Mountain City is being attacked by an army of Pedabots under the command of Billy. Take on the role of Kabitis and wield the Fire Sword to save Top Mountain City. During the mission, Kabitis will explore different areas with various stages. The game retains the 2D platform style, but with new mechanics compared to the previous title that is also included in this package and you can play up to two players. Run, somersault and bolt blows. Learn techniques as you progress through the game. Collect items by defeating enemies.
